amendment.description: An amendment to provide increases in the Public and Indian Housing Programs Tenant-Based Rental Assistance programs and to insert provisos which direct the Secretary to distribute the funds to specific uses.

action.text: Mr. Diaz-Balart raised a point of order against the Nadler amendment (A031). Mr. Diaz-Balart stated that the amendment seeks to cause a net increase in budget authority in violation of the provisions of H. Res. 5. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. Nadler.
